properties.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 4 at 9:01AM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures
as low as 28 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds
10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.

* WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys.

* WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to
10 AM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 3 PM PST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect severe
damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected
pets or livestock.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
